list.actionInfo: Right-click on a user to view actions

deactivateConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate user <1>{{username}}</1>?
deactivateConfirm.warning: Deactivating user will log them out and restrict their access to the system.

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to <1>delete</1> user <2>{{username}}</2>?
deleteConfirm.warning: This action is irreversible and will <1>permanently</1> erase user data.

deleteSelected.message: Are you sure you want to <1>delete</1> <2>{{amount}}</2> selected user(s)?
deleteSelected.warning: This action is irreversible and will <1>permanently</1> erase their data.

list.mobileWarning: This page was not designed for mobile devices, some features may not work properly.

permissions.title: Permissions for '{{username}}'
permissions.subtitle: Manage user permissions
permissions.superadminWarning: Superadmin can perform any action in the system and cannot be restricted.

tooltips.discordID: You can paste the user's discord ID here to send them their password and automatically verify them.

warnings.sendViaDiscord: <1>Note:</1> The password cannot be copied or set to a custom one! When a user's password is updated, it will be sent to the user via discord.
warnings.notVerified: User is not verified, password cannot be sent to the user!
